resources.string:
PocketMoto
 Designed by:
 William Freeman

 Source code can be found at:
 https://github.com/Make7UpYours/PocketMoto-CS449

 Background Music Credits:
 "Driven"(Edit) by McFarland BEATS
 Obtained from:
 http://www.mattmcfarland.com/

 PocketMoto is a mod of StarFighter by:
 J.F. DiMarzo

 Original source can be found at:
 http://www.apress.com/9781430240297

Blue Suit of Noobness
 STATS:
 Color: Blue
 Handling: Terrible
 HP: 3

 Cost: 0 Credits
